publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6070 Sarah Boyack: Boroughmuir High’s Quiz Champions—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Boroughmuir High School on winning the Scottish Young Consumer of the Year competition; notes that the worthy winners were Boroughmuir pupils Imogen Ross, Elspie Horne, Alice Mackenzie and team captain Douglas Boubert, and considers their excellent knowledge and skill to be a credit to both the individual pupils and teachers involved and to the whole school.

S3M-6070 Sarah Boyack: Boroughmuir High’s Quiz Champions—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Boroughmuir High School on winning the Scottish Young Consumer of the Year competition; notes that the worthy winners were Boroughmuir pupils Imogen Ross, Elspie Horne, Alice Mackenzie and team captain Douglas Boubert, and considers their excellent knowledge and skill to be a credit to both the individual pupils and teachers involved and to the whole school. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Pauline McNeill*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-6070 Boroughmuir High’s Quiz Champions (lodged on 25 March 2010) George Foulkes*, James Kelly*, Cathy Jamieson*, Gavin Brown*
S3M-6070 Boroughmuir High’s Quiz Champions (lodged on 25 March 2010) Karen Whitefield*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-6070 Boroughmuir High’s Quiz Champions (lodged on 25 March 2010) David Stewart*
